title: Conferences
subtitle: Host your next conference in a unique coastal setting
intro: Mollösunds Wärdshus offers a peaceful and inspiring environment for your conference or business meeting. Away from the hustle and bustle of the city, our venue provides the perfect setting for focused discussions and team building.

facilities.title: Conference Facilities
facilities.description: We offer modern conference facilities with all the necessary equipment.

room1.name: The Sea Room
room1.description: A bright and spacious room with sea views.

room2.name: The Harbor Room
room2.description: A cozy room with a view of the harbor.

facilities.equipment: All our conference rooms are equipped with projectors, screens, whiteboards, and high-speed WiFi.

packages.title: Conference Packages
packages.description: We offer a range of conference packages to suit your needs.

fullDay.title: Full Day Package
fullDay.includes: Conference room, morning coffee, lunch, afternoon coffee, and basic equipment.

halfDay.title: Half Day Package
halfDay.includes: Conference room, coffee, lunch, and basic equipment.

residential.title: Residential Package
residential.includes: Conference room, morning coffee, lunch, afternoon coffee, dinner, accommodation, and breakfast.

activities.title: Team Building Activities
activities.description: We can arrange a variety of team building activities to complement your conference.
activities.options: Options include sailing, fishing, cooking classes, and guided tours of Mollösund.

food.title: Food & Beverages
food.description: We offer high-quality food and beverages for your conference.
food.options: Our chef can create custom menus based on your preferences and dietary requirements.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: We have 10 beautifully decorated rooms for you and your colleagues.
accommodation.note: Special rates are available for conference participants.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For more information or to book your conference, please contact us at:

builder.title: Conference Builder
builder.description: Use our interactive conference builder to create your own custom package. Choose your date, number of attendees, and customize with add-ons that suit your needs.
